credit_line: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: Officer and Aide Inspecting a Squadron
medium: Black and white crayon on blue-green laid paper
description: Horizontal view showing in foreground a column of infantry with colors standing to attention, while at extreme left, the furthest right bugleman is addressed, probably, by the staff sargent, who stands beside an officer in a waiting attitude, and at right middle ground, a mule is visible fastened to a peg.
name: Drawing
